src_original: śraddadhāsi tvam ānanda /  pattīyasi /  yad ahaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya guṇān varṇayāmi /  atha te kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vâtra gambhīre buddhagocare //  athâyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat /
na me bhadanta bhagavan kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā tathāgatabhāṣiteṣu sūtrânteṣu /
tgt_original: 「世尊！ 我於如來所說契經深義，不生疑惑。
一切如來身、語、意業，皆無虛妄。

src_original: imau bhagavan candrasūryāv evaṃ maharddhikāv evaṃ mahânubhāvau pṛthivyāṃ patetāṃ /
tgt_original: 世尊！ 此日月輪，可令墮落；

src_original: na tu buddhānāṃ vacanam anyathā bhavet //
kiṃtu bhadanta bhagavan santi satvāḥ śraddhêndriyavikalā ye buddhagocaraṃ śrutvā na śraddadhati /  teṣām evaṃ bhavati /
tgt_original: 世尊！ 然有眾生，信根不具，聞說諸佛甚深境界，作是思惟：

src_original: katham idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ smaraṇamātreṇa tasya tathāgatasyâittakā guṇânuśaṃsā bhavati /
tgt_original: 『云何但念七佛名號，便獲爾所功德、勝利？
